attributes.action: To regenerate the housing stock we already have to put back into Public usage instead of building new houses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has announced 2,000 New Council Houses to be built, though ALL over the Country there are masses amounts of houses which have been boarded up, and put out of use for more then a year.

This is disgusting and these homes should be put back into working order before constantly building new ones, this in turn will REDUCE the amount of people on the housing list, and the homeless as well.
